entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
